title: Omega Squad Twitch's W is disappointing
body: They used the base skin's sound for his W even though every other skin in the line has completely new SFX. This was even brought up while it was on the PBE and Rito didn't say or do anything about it. Everything else about the skin is great but this is a letdown.

replies.body: You're totally right. I played him last night, and the VFX had changed since I last saw it. I just cooked up a fresh sound for his W and it should be coming out next patch!

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sRq7xd9w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-29T01:51:52.457+0000)
>
> You're totally right. I played him last night, and the VFX had changed since I last saw it. I just cooked up a fresh sound for his W and it should be coming out next patch!

Its much more offensive that omega squad twitch "playing his violin"(taunt?) doesnt do anything... at all. He literally waves the motions and it accomplishes nothing at all. No sound, no animation... =/  As the first twitch skin released in a long time (other than the championship one) I was really hoping for a more complete experience. Makes an otherwise great skin feel rushed tbh.

That was brought up when it was in PBE too, but the team pretty much just brushed it off. Most of the Twitch mains are mostly just happy he's getting something new regardless if it meets quality standards or not.

> [{quoted}](name=blackfootedfox,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sRq7xd9w,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2017-07-29T04:04:07.403+0000)
>
> That was brought up when it was in PBE too, but the team pretty much just brushed it off. Most of the Twitch mains are mostly just happy he's getting something new regardless if it meets quality standards or not.

Well as a twitch main thats been playing for 4+ years i feel rather ripped off cause twitch probably isnt going to see another skin for years...
I don't think they're "happy" with it but is just dealing with it. (since the other animations are pretty cool regardless)
So sick to see Rioters interacting on these types of posts

Thank you! This is Twitch's first skin since I started playing League when A. Sol came out (and he's my first and only main too), so I've been watching it prettly closely since PBE (and the Reddit leak).
